feed.title: Akash Patki
feed.subtitle: A showcase for a Toronto-based full-stack developer with 15+ years of experience across startups, scale-ups, and big banks.

entry.title: Core Idea Behing Encoding, Hashing, and Encryption
entry.summary: How does your digital information stay safe and compatible with online sysstems? Understanding the core differences between encoding, hashing, and encryption is crucial for every software engineer.

entry.title: The Four Faces of a Developer: Why Every Dev Has (At Least) 4 Personalities
entry.summary: Every developer juggles at least four identities — polished pro, clueless explainer, chill buddy, and masked internet gremlin — depending on who's watching

entry.title: No More `if isinstance`— Polymorphism in Python with `@singledispatch`!
entry.summary: Polymorphism sounds complex, but it’s easier (and cooler) than you think. Let a cartoon snake walk you through writing cleaner Python code.

entry.title: When You’re the Judge and the Contestant for your and their ideas.
entry.summary: You’re in a team meeting, two ideas clash, and yours is one of them. How do you stay fair, thoughtful, and not spiral into self-doubt? Here's a relatable deep dive into the mental gymnastics of honest decision-making.
